blog.name: krazykariana
blog.title: Kariana Keyes
blog.description:
Female | 21 | Miami | BiSexual
From Deviantart,to YouTube, and other sites you may know me as KrazyKari of the Spyro, Crash Bandicoot, Lion King, Ratchet and Clank, MLP fandoms, and more. 
I mostly do digital art using Paint Tool Sai, but I also do a lot of cosplay art. I'm all around in love with art, so I do pretty much everything, sculptures, photography, and more, but digital art and cosplay is my main focus.
I suit as Bianca the Rabbit from the Spyro series!
I love to make friends, don't be shy at all to talk to me! Though I must say that I'm a busy person and I may not always have much time to talk.

summary: okay so some of my thoughts after just finishing the detective pikachu game and having seen the movie... neža, jam don’t EVEN...
body:
okay so some of my thoughts after just finishing the detective pikachu game and having seen the movie… neža, jam don’t EVEN LOOK AT THIS until after you play the game

1. game mewtwo is a secretive little bitch
2. i thought it would have been cooler if emilia was the villain (she’s always popping up everywhere on ‘official gnn business’ SURE JAN)
3. amanda…………….. sexy…. please marry me
4. game tim goodman is meh
5. all the pokemon are great, amazing, talented, beautiful and i would die for every single one
6. THAT ENDING??? HELLO?? having seen the movie it just left me confused and like obviously it’s teasing for a sequel, finding harry and all….
7. i wish the hi-hat cafe was real
8. THE GREAT DETECTIVE PIKACHU…………… let’s go out for a coffee sometimes

summary: I’m not as much of an artist but I’d have a writer Rymesona with my shiny Pansear Sunspot. He’d sit in my lap or drape himself...
body: I’m not as much of an artist but I’d have a writer Rymesona with my shiny Pansear Sunspot. He’d sit in my lap or drape himself across my shoulders to keep my lizard body warm so I can focus on my writing instead of how cold I am. Sunspot is a Good Boy™️

blog.name: pokemonwithoutspoilers
blog.title: Pokemon Without Spoilers
blog.description: A Pokemon News Repost Blog for those who wish to keep up with current-game news but wish to know as little about Pokemon Sword and Pokemon Shield

summary: Spinoff Announcements
title: Spinoff Announcements
body:
Yesterday’s Pokemon Press Conference was filled with announcements of upcoming spinoff games. A summary:

- Pokemon Quest Mobile is coming to China. It’s already out in many other areas.

- Detective Pikachu (the 3DS game) is getting a sequel on the Switch

- Pokemon Home is Bank’s successor. It will allow imports from Bank, Pokemon GO, Pokemon Let’s Go Pikachu/Eevee, and Pokemon Sword/Shield. It will export to Sword/Shield only. Of note, it will be accessible through smartphones and you can trade directly with other Pokemon Home users.

- Pokemon Masters is an app made by DeNA. It includes characters from the main series, such as Gym Leaders, Champions, and Player Characters. It appears to be a Gacha game, but not enough information was shown to confirm this.

- Pokemon Sleep will be an app that interfaces with a new device: the Pokemon Go Plus+ (not to be confused with the Pokemon Go Plus or the Pokeball Plus). It will somehow track your sleep and give you prizes of some sort.

- Snorlax is temporarily spawning commonly in Pokemon GO right now. It is sleeping and is not catchable in your first two balls. It has the exclusive move Yawn.

- Pokemon Direct happening next week with Sword/Shield news.

Due to the nature of this blog, I will not be discussing most of what’s in the Pokemon Direct next week. If they announce the release date, I will mention that, but no more. Similarly, for the Spinoffs, I will be only discuss the main gameplay type, any bonuses for other games, and the release date if/when more information is available during this Sword/Shield hype cycle.

summary: Pokemon Detective Pikachu - The Seed for the Future
title: Pokemon Detective Pikachu - The Seed for the Future
body:
Pokemon Detective Pikachu - The Seed for the Future - My Brief impressions on #Pokemon #DetectivePikachu a movie I ended up liking for all the reasons other than what I was expecting.

I had a whole bunch of worries going into Detective Pikachu. It seems kind of silly in hindsight, seeing as how this is a kid’s movie at the end of the day. Strangely, the things that did linger on my mind turned out to be some of the best parts of the movie.

(more…)

summary: DETECTIVE PIKACHU TENDRÁ SECUELA EN NINTENDO SWITCH #Nintendo #DETECTIVEPIKACHU #Juegos #CorporativoArcanos #Masukomi...
title: DETECTIVE PIKACHU TENDRÁ SECUELA EN NINTENDO SWITCH #Nintendo #DETECTIVEPIKACHU #Juegos #CorporativoArcanos #Masukomi #SutaArcanos #Noticias
body:
DETECTIVE PIKACHU TENDRÁ SECUELA EN NINTENDO SWITCH #Nintendo #DETECTIVEPIKACHU #Juegos #CorporativoArcanos #Masukomi #SutaArcanos #Noticias

Detective Pikachu se ha convertido en todo un suceso gracias a su película, lo cual resulta increíble si consideramos que muchos no jugaron el juego de 3DS en el que está basado. Por lo visto en Nintendo y The Pokémon Company notaron esto y es por esa misma razón que, para corregirlo, anunciaron su intención por lanzar una secuela del título en Switch.

Durante una conferencia especial…

DETECTIVE PIKACHU TENDRÁ SECUELA EN NINTENDO SWITCH #Nintendo #DETECTIVEPIKACHU #Juegos #CorporativoArcanos #Masukomi #SutaArcanos #Noticias

External image

Detective Pikachu se ha convertido en todo un suceso gracias a su película, lo cual resulta increíble si consideramos que muchos no jugaron el juego de 3DS en el que está basado. Por lo visto en Nintendo y The Pokémon Company notaron esto y es por esa misma razón que, para corregirlo, anunciaron su intención por lanzar una secuela del título en Switch.

Durante una conferencia especial…
